about_the_game:
The Vacant Kingdom Soundtrack includes all of the music in the game! Also included are a couple of bonus track which were in Prologue For A Vacant Kingdom, but which were cut from the final game.

The majority of music in Vacant Kingdom is by Me and My Kidney. Some additional tracks were done by Trov and shru.

This soundtrack weighs in at 30 tracks and has a runtime of 1 hour and 18 minutes. It's available in high-quality MP3 (320kbps) and lossless FLAC for audiophiles.

name: Vacant Kingdom Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 177 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 729 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Available in MP3 (320kbps) or FLAC.

short_description: A hype-bussin' soundtrack by Me and My Kidney and shru! Play it in your dad's Elantra when he passes you the aux cable!
